org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical

Interface AttributeFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAttributeFactory

    public interface AttributeFactory
    Interface for factories that create attribute collections for page content objects. Different types of content need different attributes.
    Author:
    clc

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.primaresearch.shared.variable.VariableMap createAttributes(ContentType type)
      Returns a collection of attributes suitable for content objects of the given type.
      org.primaresearch.shared.variable.VariableMap createAttributes(TextContent textContent)
      Returns a collection of attributes for text content objects.

    • Method Detail
